Articles.Content:
Ladee or Lunar Atmosphere And Dust Enviorment Explorer. Was a Nasa spacecraft that explored the moon. From orbit.

![zEtWUVV.png](http://i.imgur.com/zEtWUVV.png)

![oWg9BID.png](http://i.imgur.com/oWg9BID.png)

Download: [http://www./download/jvgf2hoxd6hsk37/LADEE.craft](http://www./download/jvgf2hoxd6hsk37/LADEE.craft)
Neat craft. The real LADEE had a modular construction not unlike KSP, a standard spacecraft bus developed at NASA Ames Research Center.

Hey man, did you make the launcher from SRBs? The real rocket has five SRB stages. I made one an aagggee ago, here it is for reference:

It is probably broken by the updates but would be an easy fix to add the new fairings too. I even landed it on the Mun once! That was LOL.

Anyway, I don't mean to hijack your thread, ooh in fact better to ask. Would you mind if I posted pictures of my old LADEE here for reference?

Anywhoo, good job on the probe mate. I would like to see the launch vehicle too though.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-01T18:29:38Z" title="08/01/2015 06:29  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 1, 2015</time> by Majorjim**

> 
> Hey man, did you make the launcher from SRBs? The real rocket has five SRB stages. I made one an aagggee ago, here it is for reference:
> It is probably broken by the updates but would be an easy fix to add the new fairings too. I even landed it on the Mun once! That was LOL.
> 
> Anyway, I don't mean to hijack your thread, ooh in fact better to ask. Would you mind if I posted pictures of my old LADEE here for reference?
> 
> Anywhoo, good job on the probe mate. I would like to see the launch vehicle too though.

His looks a bit too big for the (should be) 1.25m Minotaur, but the craft is really good, better than mine right now! He just forgot about the auxilary side thrusters.

> 
> His looks a bit too big for the (should be) 1.25m Minotaur, but the craft is really good, better than mine right now! He just forgot about the auxilary side thrusters.

Yeah I noticed that too.

> 
> Hey man, did you make the launcher from SRBs? The real rocket has five SRB stages. I made one an aagggee ago, here it is for reference:
> It is probably broken by the updates but would be an easy fix to add the new fairings too. I even landed it on the Mun once! That was LOL.
> 
> Anyway, I don't mean to hijack your thread, ooh in fact better to ask. Would you mind if I posted pictures of my old LADEE here for reference?
> 
> Anywhoo, good job on the probe mate. I would like to see the launch vehicle too though.

 Pictures would be great. And i used an ugly rocket:(. But i can try to make a Minotaur V.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-02T06:21:28Z" title="08/02/2015 06:21  AM" data-short="8 yr">August 2, 2015</time> by Lime**

> 
> Pictures would be great. And i used an ugly rocket:(. But i can try to make a Minotaur V.

Ok mate, here's the LADEE I made over a year ago. 

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/UHf5J)

I have no idea If it still works though. Having said that, I do remember landing the Probe on the surface of the Mun from orbit! That was fun!

MJ
